StnryAssetEnrgyUse.name: StnryAssetEnrgyUse
StnryAssetEnrgyUse.description: Represents the energy consumption related to stationary assets across multiple fuel types.

AllocEnrgyAttrCrBiomass.description: Total energy attribute certificate credits from the biomass clean energy type that are allocated to this energy use record. Available in API version 59.0 and later.

AllocEnrgyAttrCrGeothermal.description: Total energy attribute certificate credits from the geothermal clean energy type that are allocated to this energy use record.Available in API version 59.0 and later.

AllocEnrgyAttrCrInKwh.description: The total energy attribute certificate credits that are allocated to this energy use record.Available in API version 59.0 and later.

AllocEnrgyAttrCrSolar.description: Total energy attribute certificate credits from the solar clean energy type that are allocated to this energy use record.Available in API version 59.0 and later.

AllocEnrgyAttrCrWind.description: Total energy attribute certificate credits from the wind clean energy type that are allocated to this energy use record.Available in API version 59.0 and later.

AllocatedRenewableEnergyInKwh.description: The value to override the allocated renewable energy for the energy use record.

CarbonFootprintReportDate.description: The date when the carbon footprint data of the associated stationary asset is due to be sent to a reporting body.

Ch4EmissionsInKg.description: The CH4 emissions that are calculated for this energy use record.

Co2EmissionsInKg.description: The CO2 emissions that are calculated for this energy use record.

CrbnEmssnScopeAlloc.description: The allocation of fuel consumption for different scope emissions to override the scope allocation defined in the stationary asset for the fuel type.

DataGapFillingMethodName.description: The data gap filling method that's used if this record was generated by the application.

ElectricityEmissionFactorsId.description: The electricity emissions factors record associated with this location.

EndDate.description: The date until when the values of this energy use record are valid.

FinalEnergyConsumption.description: The final energy consumption calculated using the data gap-filling method.

FuelConsumption.description: The amount of fuel consumed during the data entry period.

FuelConsumptionInGigajoule.description: The amount of fuel consumed during the data entry period in GJ (gigajoules).

FuelConsumptionInKwh.description: The amount of fuel consumed during the data entry period in kWh.

FuelConsumptionUnit.description: The unit of measure for the consumed fuel. For custom fuel unit of measure, if the NamespacePrefix exists then this value is {NamespacePrefix}_custom_{DeveloperName of the SustainabilityUom object}; for example, ftPackage_custom_bundle, else this value is custom_{DeveloperName of the SustainabilityUom object}; for example, custom_bundle.

FuelType.description: The type of fuel consumed for this energy use record. For custom fuels, if the NamespacePrefix exists then this value is {NamespacePrefix}_custom_{DeveloperName of the FuelType object}; for example, ftPackage_custom_wood, else this value is custom_{DeveloperName of the FuelType object}; for example, custom_wood.

FuelTypeRefId.description: This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

IsCompanyOwnedAsset.description: Indicates whether the asset is owned by the organization.

IsPueMonthlyRange.description: Indicates whether the monthly power usage effectiveness range is between 1 and 2.

IsRecordLocked.description: Indicates that the stationary asset energy use record is locked for editing because the associated carbon footprint is locked for editing.

IsSystemGeneratedRecord.description: Indicates whether the energy use record was created by data gap filling.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LocBasedElectrFrBiomassInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from biomass for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the location-based method.

LocBasedElectrFrNuclearInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from nuclear power for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the location-based method.

LocBasedElectrFrOthrFuelInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from other fuel energy sources for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the location-based method.

LocBasedElectrFromCoalInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from coal for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the location-based method.

LocBasedElectrFromGasInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from gas for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the location-based method.

LocBasedElectrFromHydroInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from hydroelectric energy sources for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the location-based method.

LocBasedElectrFromOilInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from oil for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the location-based method.

LocBasedElectrFromSolarInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from solar photovoltaic energy sources for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the location-based method.

LocBasedElectrFromWindInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from wind for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the location-based method.

LocBsdElectrFrGeothermalInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from geothermal energy sources for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the location-based method.

LocBsdElectrFrNonRenewablesKwh.description: The total electricity generated from geothermal energy sources for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the location-based method.

LocBsdElectrOthrFossilFuelKwh.description: The total electricity generated from other fossil fuel energy sources for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the location-based method.

MktBasedElectrFrBiomassInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from biomass for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the market-based method.

MktBasedElectrFrNuclearInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from nuclear power for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the market-based method.

MktBasedElectrFromCoalInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from coal for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the market-based method.

MktBasedElectrFromGasInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from gas for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the market-based method.

MktBasedElectrFromHydroInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from hydroelectric energy sources for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the market-based method.

MktBasedElectrFromOilInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from oil for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the market-based method.

MktBasedElectrFromSolarInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from solar photovoltaic energy sources for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the market-based method.

MktBasedElectrFromWindInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from wind for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the market-based method.

MktBasedElectrOthrFuelInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from other fuel energy sources for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the market-based method.

MktBsdCh4EmssnInKg.description: The CH4 emissions for the associated energy use record, that’s calculated using the market-based method.

MktBsdCo2EmssnInKg.description: The CO2 emissions for the associated energy use record, that’s calculated using the market-based method.

MktBsdElectrFrGeothermalInKwh.description: The total electricity generated from geothermal energy sources for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the market-based method.

MktBsdElectrFrNonRenewablesKwh.description: The percentage of total non-renewable energy generated from coal, gas, nuclear, oil, and other sources for this market.

MktBsdElectrOthrFossilFuelKwh.description: The total electricity generated from other fossil fuel energy sources for all the associated energy use records, that’s used to calculate emissions using the market-based method.

MktBsdElectriEmssnFctrId.description: The electricity emissions factors record associated with this energy use record that’s used to calculate emissions using the market-based method.

MktBsdN2oEmssnInKg.description: The N2O emissions for the associated energy use record, that’s calculated using the market-based method.

N2oEmissionsInKg.description: The N2O emissions that are calculated for this energy use record.

Name.description: The name for this energy use record.

NormalizedMoElectrCnsmpInKwh.description: The normalized value of the average monthly electricity consumption that’s calculated based on the electricity consumption, report start date, and report end date.

OccupiedFloorArea.description: The value to override the occupied floor area of the associated stationary asset.

OccupiedFloorAreaInSqft.description: The floor area occupied by the stationary asset associated with this energy use record in square foot.

OccupiedFloorAreaUnit.description: The unit of measure for the occupied floor area of the stationary asset associated with this energy use record.

OtherEmssnFctrId.description: The other emission factors that are used to calculate the emissions.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PowerUsageEffectiveness.description: The ratio that describes how efficiently a computer data center uses the energy.

ProposedEnergyConsumption.description: The energy consumption proposed by the data gap-filling method

RefrigerantEmssnFctrId.description: The refrigerant emissions factor record containing global warming potential values.

RenewableEnergyType.description: Specifies the energy type to override the renewable energy that’s accounted for in an allocated renewable energy.

Scope1EmissionsInTco2e.description: The total scope 1 emissions from all the associated energy use records and supplemental emissions.

Scope2LocBasedEmssnInTco2e.description: The total scope 2 emissions value that’s calculated based on the location-based data of grid emissions.

Scope2MktBasedEmssnInTco2e.description: The total scope 2 emissions value that's calculated based on the utility-provided emissions data and allocated renewable energy.

Scope3DnstrmEmissionsInTco2e.description: The scope 3 emissions from downstream activities. This value is calculated based on the scope 3 downstream emission values and supplemental scope 3 downstream emission values of all the associated energy use records.

Scope3GhgCategory.description: Specifies the scope 3 GHG category related to the energy use by the stationary asset environmental source.

Scope3UpstrmEmissionsInTco2e.description: The scope 3 emissions from upstream activities. This value is calculated based on the scope 3 upstream emission values and supplemental scope 3 upstream emission values of all the associated energy use records.

StartDate.description: The date from when the values of this energy use record are valid.

StnryAssetCrbnFtprntId.description: The stationary asset carbon footprint record associated with this energy use record.

StnryAssetEnvrSrcId.description: The stationary asset environmental source record associated with this energy use record.

SuplScope1Emissions.description: The supplemental scope 1 emissions value that’s added to the calculated total scope 1 emissions value

SuplScope2LocationBasedEmssn.description: The supplemental scope 2 location-based emissions value that’s added to the calculated total scope 2 location-based emissions value

SuplScope2MarketBasedEmssn.description: The supplemental scope 2 market-based emissions value that’s added to the calculated total scope 2 market-based emissions value

SuplScope3DnstrmEmissions.description: The supplemental scope 3 emissions value from downstream activities that’s added to the calculated total scope 3 emissions value

SuplScope3UpstrmEmissions.description: The supplemental scope 3 emissions value from upstream activities that’s added to the calculated total scope 3 emissions value

SupplierId.description: The supplier that is associated with this energy use record.

TotRnwlEnrgyExclHydroInKwh.description: The total renewable energy excluding hydroelectric energy. This value is calculated based on the market-based grid mix values and allocated renewable energy values.

TotalFloorArea.description: The value to override the total floor area of the associated stationary asset environmental source.

TotalFloorAreaInSqft.description: The total floor area of the stationary asset associated with this energy use record in square foot.

TotalFloorAreaUnit.description: The unit of measure for the total floor area of the stationary asset associated with this energy use record.

TotalFuelConsumptionInKwh.description: The total fuel consumed in kWh. This value is calculated by multiplying the electricity consumed with the power usage effectiveness value.

TotalRenewableEnergyInKwh.description: The total renewable energy in kWh that's calculated based on the market-based grid mix values and the allocated renewable energy value.
